description: Grants permission to add a comment to an existing case.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCaseComment to specify a case ID.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: An optional element used in combination with CreateCaseComment. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCaseComment to add content for the new comment.

nested_items.name: commentId
nested_items.description: Response element indicating the new comment ID.
